channel.title: 317 help with some commands
channel.description:
I'm running a 317 using Modscape source, and I want to make two commands, one called ::commands to show you your commands available, and another called ::booth for admins to spawn a bank booth. Can someone help me with that?
My big priority is the ::booth one.

item.title: 317 help with some commands
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("booth") && playerRights > 1) { makeGlobalObject(absX, absY, 2213, 0, 10); }

Read full topic

item.title: 317 help with some commands
item.dc:creator: @grey_apple2 grey apple2
item.description:
@grey_apple2 wrote:

I want to temporarily spawn a bankbooth. Like, admins can for normal players if they want, or if they are out skilling they can spawn it so they won’t need to constantly type ::bank.

Read full topic

item.title: 317 help with some commands
item.dc:creator: @Opium10 Opium10
item.description:
@Opium10 wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”]Are you trying to spawn a bank, like add a booth to that coordinate, forever?
Or, just temporary?

Also, would you rather just open the bank interface, or actually spawn a bank?[/quote]
The spawning of a bank would be cool, mind telling us how to do that?

The bank command is like

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("booth")) openUpBank(); }
Change the 1 to a: 0 = all players 1 = Moderators 2 = Administrators 3 = Owners

Read full topic

item.title: 317 help with some commands
item.dc:creator: @kneistol kneistol
item.description:
@kneistol wrote:

::commands is just to rip out of a source and for the bank… find a ::bank and rip it out XD

Read full topic
